**What You'll Love About Working With Us**

This role involves close collaboration with various stakeholders to understand automation requirements, design effective automation solutions, and enhance existing processes.Key Responsibilities:Comprehensive Testing Skills: Proficient in developing tests for both frontend (UI, mobile) and backend (API, integration, component) systems.Programming Proficiency: Strong skills in programming languages such as JS/TS and Java.Automation Expertise: Proficient in the creation, development, and maintenance of automated test scripts utilizing Playwright with JS/TS, Selenium, Appium, JUnit, TestNG, BDD Cucumber, and RestAssured.Mobile Testing Experience: experience in mobile testing using tools like AppiumAPI Testing Skills: Proficient in API testing with tools like RestAssured and Postman.Scalable Solutions: Ensure automation solutions are scalable and reusable across different projects.Collaborative Approach: Work closely with QA analysts, developers, and business analysts to identify automation needs.Requirement and Design Participation: Participate in requirement gathering and design sessions to provide input on automation feasibility.Test Execution and Analysis: Execute automated test scripts, analyze results, and report defects.Regression Testing: Perform regression testing and validate application functionality.CI/CD Integration: Proficient in working with DevOps teams to integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins or ADO etc..Process Improvement: Identify opportunities for improving automation processes and tools.Continuous Learning: Stay updated with the latest trends and best practices in automation testing.Training and Support: Provide training and support to team members on automation tools and processes.Effective Communication: Strong communication skills, with the ability to collaborate with cross\\-functional teams and stakeholders.

title: Sr. Engineer QA/QC
description:
**Company Description**
  

 Larsen And Toubro Construction is a premier company specializing in heavy civil infrastructure, metallurgical, material handling, and road and expressways construction services. Renowned for its large\\-scale projects, the company is a trusted player in real estate and construction sectors. It is dedicated to delivering world\\-class engineering and construction solutions across diverse industries. With a strong presence in the market, Larsen And Toubro excels in executing projects with precision and efficiency.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 We are seeking a full\\-time Sr. Engineer QA/QC to join our team in Jamnagar, in an on\\-site capacity. The primary responsibilities include overseeing quality assurance and quality control processes, executing testing activities, developing and managing test cases, and conducting manual and software testing. Additional duties involve ensuring adherence to quality standards, identifying and resolving any issues during testing, and collaborating with multidisciplinary teams to uphold project quality.
   

  

**Qualifications**
  

* Proficiency in Test Execution and creating and maintaining Test Cases.
* Strong expertise in Quality Assurance and Manual Testing processes.
* Experience in Software Testing and ability to identify and resolve defects effectively.
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills for team collaboration.
* Relevant certification in Quality Assurance or related fields is a plus.
* Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or a related field.
* Demonstrated experience in QA/QC roles within construction or related industries.

title: Web Developer At WebDevSoft
description:
**Company Description**

 WebDevSoft is a premier provider of innovative web development, custom software solutions, and digital transformation services. Specializing in responsive and SEO\\-optimized web development as well as enterprise\\-grade software engineering, WebDevSoft empowers businesses to achieve scalable tech solutions. Leveraging cutting\\-edge technologies like React, Node.js, and Python, the company caters to diverse industries including e\\-commerce, healthcare, finance, and education. WebDevSoft also takes pride in offering real\\-world internship programs to help aspiring developers thrive in the tech space. Headquartered in Patna, the team is committed to delivering quality, client\\-centric, and future\\-ready digital solutions.
   




**Role Description**

 This is an internship role based on\\-site at our office in Patna. The intern will assist in web and software development tasks, collaborate with team members on coding and debugging, and contribute to front\\-end and back\\-end development. Other responsibilities include conducting testing and quality assurance, assisting with the deployment of web and software solutions, and participating in team meetings to discuss project updates. This is a valuable hands\\-on learning opportunity for individuals seeking practical experience in the tech industry.
   




**Qualifications**
* Proficiency in web development technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
* Knowledge of programming languages such as Python, PHP, or Node.js
* Familiarity with front\\-end frameworks like React or Angular
* Understanding of software engineering practices such as testing, debugging, and version control
* Problem\\-solving skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment
* Strong interest in learning new technologies and upskilling in the field of software development
* Pursuing or completed a degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field
* Bonus: Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure) or mobile application development is a plus

title: Competitive Coding Expert | $70-$150/hr
description:
***This opportunity is shared as part of a referral program***




  





**Talent Requirements** 




 Mercor is seeking a unique blend of software engineering proficiency and elite competitive programming expertise. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating novel, high\\-quality evaluation tasks for AI systems.
 



  





**Essential Skills \\& Experience:** 




 ·
 **Elite Competitive Programming (CP) Aptitude:** 
 Demonstrated top\\-tier performance in algorithmic problem\\-solving. A proven track record such as an
 **IOI medal, ICPC World Finals participation, or a "Grandmaster" rating on platforms like Codeforces or Topcoder is highly preferred.** 




 ·
 **Foundational Software Engineering (SWE) Skills:** 
 Professional experience or deep familiarity with SWE workflows, including navigating large code repositories, using version control (e.g., Git), and understanding software development cycles.
 



 ·
 **Algorithmic Creativity \\& Design:** 
 Ability to move beyond
 *solving* 
 known problems to
 *inventing* 
 original, logical, and challenging competitive programming puzzles. You must be able to conceptualize novel problems with clean constraints and elegant solution paths.
 



 ·
 **Rigorous Implementation \\& Testing:** 
 Proficiency in writing optimal, bug\\-free reference solutions in
 **Python or C\\+\\+** 
 using only standard libraries. Strong skills in designing comprehensive unit tests that cover edge cases, performance limits, and all specified behaviors.
 



 ·
 **Meticulous Quality \\& Originality Focus:** 
 A commitment to producing 100% original work. You must be diligent in performing originality checks and have a keen eye for detail to ensure problem statements are clear, self\\-contained, and free of unintentional hints or ambiguities.
 



 ·
 **Strict Adherence to Expert Guidelines:** 
 Ability to follow a structured, multi\\-step authoring workflow \\- from problem drafting and test creation to solution implementation and final tutorial writing \\- while strictly adhering to all provided specifications and quality gates.
 



  





**Key Mindset \\& Attributes:** 




 ·
 **Intellectual Integrity:** 
 A firm understanding that
 **the use of AI (LLMs) to generate core task components is strictly prohibited.** 
 You must rely on and trust your own expertise.
 



 ·
 **Adaptability:** 
 Willingness to transition from traditional SWE or CP problem\\-solving mindsets to the creative, design\\-focused task of
 *authoring* 
 evaluation content.
 



 ·
 **Quality Ownership:** 
 Takes pride in crafting tasks that are not only difficult but also fair, well\\-calibrated, and effective at evaluating the multi\\-step reasoning of AI models.
 



  





**Contract and Payment Terms** 



* You will be engaged as an independent contractor.
* This is a fully remote role that can be completed on your own schedule.
* Projects can be extended, shortened, or concluded early depending on needs and performance.
* Your work at Mercor will not involve access to confidential or proprietary information from any employer, client, or institution.
* Payments are weekly on Stripe or Wise based on services rendered.
* Please note: We are unable to support H1\\-B or STEM OPT candidates at this time.



  





**Resources \\& Support** 



* For details about the interview process and platform information, please check: https://talent.docs.mercor.com/welcome/welcome



  





*PS: Mercor team reviews applications daily.*

title: Staff Software Engineer, Embedded Linux (AI2426)
description:
**Description**
**Job Title:** 
**Staff Software Engineer, Embedded Linux**
**Job Location: Bangalore, India
 ****(This position requires a full\\-time, on\\-site presence in our Bangalore, India Office)****
 Job ID: AI2426**
**Areas Of Focus**
 The SoC software team is responsible for creating the SDK for SiMa.ai’s MLSoC product line. This includes developing/porting OS, boot SW, device drivers, run time environment for multiple CPU subsystems that are part of SiMa.ai’s MLSoC(™), developing embedded Linux based applications and APIs for enabling end2end customer application flow utilizing different IO subsystems that are part of MLSoC.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 We are looking for a software engineer who has experience developing OS device drivers, boot SW and key test applications in a Linux embedded environment. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of working in a high\\-performance team and have partnered with cross functional teams across multiple geographies. Key responsibilities include (but not limited to):
   

  

* Develop and maintain drivers for high\\-speed interfaces like PCIe, Ethernet, MIPI, DDR.
* Build and maintain system level libraries for buffer management, synchronization, logging, etc.
* Optimize and add features for video processing blocks like Encoder, Decoder, ISP.
* Modify and maintain build systems like Yocto and eLxr (Debian).
* Test and verify Linux drivers and environment with Virtualizers and Zebu emulators.
* Provide SW to support HW MLSoC test validation team.


**Key Requirements**
* BS/MS in computer science with minimum 8 years of experience.
* Hands\\-on experience developing firmware, boot code and SW using high performance 64 bit Arm processors.
* Hands\\-on experience developing drivers for USB, PCIe, MIPI, Ethernet, eMMC.
* Development experience with Embedded Linux (e.g. Yocto) or embedded RTOS (e.g. Zephyr) experience is highly desirable.
* Experience of working with MIPI and ISP for Camera and Video processing is highly desirable.
* Good proficiency with C/C\\+\\+.
* Proven track record and experience building and delivering complex embedded SW products.


**Personal attributes**
 Can\\-do attitude. Strong team player. Curious, creative, and good at solving problems. Execution and results oriented. Self\\-driven, thinks big and is highly accountable. Good communication skills.
